nav.subtitle.overview: Gateway status, entry points, and a fast health read.
nav.subtitle.instances: Presence beacons from connected clients and nodes.
nav.subtitle.sessions: Inspect active sessions and adjust per-session defaults.
nav.subtitle.cron: Schedule wakeups and recurring agent runs.
nav.subtitle.skills: Manage skill availability and API key injection.
nav.subtitle.nodes: Paired devices, capabilities, and command exposure.
nav.subtitle.chat: Direct gateway chat session for quick interventions.
nav.subtitle.debug: Gateway snapshots, events, and manual RPC calls.
nav.subtitle.logs: Live tail of the gateway file logs.
brand.subtitle: Gateway Dashboard
chat.toggleFocusMode: Toggle focus mode (hide sidebar + page header)
overview.requireAuth: This gateway requires auth. Add a token or password, then click Connect.
overview.docsControlUiAuthTitle: Control UI auth docs (opens in new tab)
overview.authFailed: Auth failed. Re-copy a tokenized URL with clawdbot dashboard --no-open, or update the token, then click Connect.
overview.authFailedHint: Re-copy a tokenized URL with clawdbot dashboard --no-open, or update the token, then click Connect.
overview.insecureHint1: This page is HTTP, so the browser blocks device identity. Use HTTPS (Tailscale Serve) or open http://127.0.0.1:18789 on the gateway host.
overview.insecureHint2: If you must stay on HTTP, set gateway.controlUi.allowInsecureAuth: true (token-only).
overview.docsTailscaleTitle: Tailscale Serve docs (opens in new tab)
overview.docsInsecureHttpTitle: Insecure HTTP docs (opens in new tab)
overview.gatewayAccessSub: Where the dashboard connects and how it authenticates.
overview.connectHint: Click Connect to apply connection changes.
overview.useChannels: Use Channels to link WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Signal, or iMessage.
overview.instancesSub: Presence beacons in the last 5 minutes.
overview.sessionsSub: Recent session keys tracked by the gateway.
overview.notesSub: Quick reminders for remote control setups.
overview.noteTailscaleSub: Prefer serve mode to keep the gateway on loopback with tailnet auth.
overview.noteSessionHygieneSub: Use /new or sessions.patch to reset context.
overview.noteCronSub: Use isolated sessions for recurring runs.
